 2007-15082007-10-12TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActRoyal Canadian Mint Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of CARMAN M. JOYNT of Ottawa, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Royal Canadian Mint to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective November 22, 2007, in the place of Richard Kwan whose term will expire.
AttachmentsAttachment
